content: this is a ** free 1 ** crochet pattern to make a no-sew scrap dog with this pattern you can create a -beagle -labrador retriever -golden retriever -pug -german shepard -chihuahua and more by altering the colors and mixing pieces to create your desired dog ** become a stringydingding member to unlock my current and future crochet patterns as pdfs learn more and join here 2 ** 1 https //stringydingding com/no-sew-scrap-dog-amigurumi-free-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //members stringydingding com/
